name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safe View - Porn / Adult Site Blocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to provide comprehensive protection against adult content and porn sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The porn blocker Chrome addon, Safe View, keeps adult content at bay! 🔒 Make sure you have a safer online experience by blocking access to over a million pornographic websites.

The blocker page has integrated meditation activities to help you stay focused and attentive. 🎨 Play entertaining games that are meant to divert and refocus your attention to ward off temptation.

💻 Take charge of your surfing behaviors to make the internet a healthy place.

🔍 Discover Safe View right now to recover your internet privacy and tranquility.
